channel.title: Repp++ for who can help me with [pi]
channel.description: I coded 2 worlds But now the problem is i need to make it save the character in the other world to. I know its in playersave.java and i need to do something with the ./Data/characters But the World 2 loads the character of world 1 Thats correctly but world 1 doesnt load from world 2. So how can i make it it will save the charachters if u switch from world?
